name: Kaelrath Emberhide
title: King of the Ridge
bio: A former smith's apprentice who rose to sovereignty. Kaelrath carries the weight of a dying race and the hope of the Warden-Keep. He is a pragmatic leader who prefers to lead from the shadows, utilizing his Rogue instincts to protect his people.
motivation: Ensure the survival of the EmberHeart settlement against the encroaching Scourge.
